thread.section_title: PhoneIndia.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PhoneIndia.com | phoneindia.com
thread.title: Amit Negandhi

author: Amit Negandhi
title: Amit Negandhi
text: I have been using Phone India for over 6 years now and I have not switched to any other provider. It is the best and the most value-for-money long distance calling service there is. When I call home, it's like talking to them as if I am I'm my own country! That speaks of the quality of calls and ease of use of their service. Keep up the good work Team Phone India.
